amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit Food Stamp Program funds from being used in contravention of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section providing that none of the funds under the food stamp program may be expended in contravention of section 213a of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1183a).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 262 (Roll no. 367).
